email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit high for us. Would you consider $49.75 per ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I can come down to $50.00 per ton, but that’s the best I can do. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. We can agree to $50.00 per ton, provided the laycan remains firm at 15-20 October. Can you confirm the vessel’s readiness and send over the charter party draft? Also, please confirm the demurrage rate is in USD. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. Yes, the laycan is firm, and the vessel is ready. I’ll send over the charter party draft shortly. The demurrage rate is indeed in USD. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. We’re good to proceed. Please send the draft, and we’ll review it today. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John
